body_html:
Closing this out as it seems to be more suited for stackoverflow (where it seems your question has been answered).

We try to keep the github issues focused on bugs and feature requests and prefer any "support" questions go to stackoverflow.

Thanks for understanding.

body:
Closing this out as it seems to be more suited for stackoverflow (where it seems [your question has been answered](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42244666/how-to-build-static-libraries-and-linkthem-to-a-c-project-in-linux-platform/42257312#42257312)).

We try to keep the github issues focused on bugs and feature requests and prefer any "support" questions go to stackoverflow.

Thanks for understanding.
